TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConventionForeignKeyBuilder implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.IConventionAnnotatableBuilder
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IConventionForeignKeyBuilder implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.IConventionAnnotatableBuilder

summary.para: Provides a simple API surface for configuring an from conventions.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions for more information and examples.

Docs.returns: The same builder instance if the requiredness was configured, otherwise.
